content: पारिषद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (दी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Belonging to an assembly or council. --दः {@--1@} A person present at an assembly, a member of an assembly, such as an assessor. {@--2@} A king's companion. --दाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) The retinue of a god. --दं Taking part in an assembly.
